text: Xanadu is a song by Olivia Newton-John and the Electric Light Orchestra that's about a paradise somewhere. ==People== *Olivia Newton-John – lead and backing vocals *Jeff Lynne – guitars, keyboards, backing vocals *Bev Bevan – drums, percussion *Richard Tandy – keyboards *Kelly Groucutt – bass guitar, backing vocals *James Newton Howard – synthesizers *Louis Clark – strings ==References== ==Other websites== *In-depth Song Analysis at the Jeff Lynne Song Database (jefflynnesongs.com) * * Category:1980 songs Category:Olivia Newton-John songs Category:Electric Light Orchestra songs
title: Xanadu (song)
